nodes.text: The Lianna system was a star system located in the galaxy. Located near the Felucia system on the western side of the Perlemian Trade Route, the Shaltin Tunnels hyperspace route ran through the Lianna system to the Perlemian.

The Lianna system was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the twenty-first issue of the Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around May 27, 2015. The Lianna system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Mission to Lianna, a 1996 paperback supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published by West End Games.
